root: ^Boss! The fire is set! Let's go!
^Perfect, let's get out of here, boys!
^Willow stop! We need to put out the fire!
^The girls try to put out the fire
^We can't let it burn! I can't lose a home again...
^Yuki let it go, we can't save it completely, at least we still have some of our stuf.
^I can't believe it... all this work, just for some no-name stupid bandits to burn our home... Why?
^When I get me hands on them! I'll make sure they pay in full!
^I might have and idea... but we will need to prepare for the worst.
^Yeah we will need to steal from the merchant family...
^A heist? We will need to prepare for such a dangerous mission.
^We will have to put all of our money together to get tools for it. Claire are you okay with it?
